WWRP
Excitebike World Challenge

There are 2 different versions of this game.

The codes may or may not work, depending on what version you have.

Infinite Turbo (B+1) [Sharkbyte]
284A822A 00000600
48000000 805B0D38
DE000000 80008180
1401AE10 00000000
E0000000 80008000

Get head start (minus) [Sharkbyte]
284A822A 00001000
48000000 805B0D38
DE000000 80008180
14009D0C 00000000
E0000000 80008000

All CPU drones frozen (A) [Sharkbyte]
284A822A 00000800
48000000 805B0D38
DE000000 80008180
14009B38 00000001
14009BD4 00000001
14009C70 00000001
E0000000 80008000

All CPU drones unfrozen (minus) [Sharkbyte]
284A822A 00001000
48000000 805b0d38
DE000000 80008180
14009B38 00000000
14009BD4 00000000
14009C70 00000000
E0000000 80008000

Moon Jump (B) [Sharkbyte]
284A822A FBFF0400
48000000 805B0D38
DE000000 80008180
1401AC58 42000000
E0000000 80008000

1st CPU moon jump [Sharkbyte]
284A822A FBFF0400
48000000 805B0D38
DE000000 80008180
1400EE58 42000000
E0000000 80008000

2nd CPU moon jump [Sharkbyte]
284A822A FBFF0400
48000000 805B0D38
DE000000 80008180
14012A18 42000000
E0000000 80008000

3rd CPU moon jump [Sharkbyte]
284A822A FBFF0400
48000000 805B0D38
DE000000 80008180
140165D8 42000000
E0000000 80008000

Super Speed (2) [Sharkbyte]
284A822A FEFF0100
48000000 805B0D38
DE000000 80008180
1401AC54 42B00000
E0000000 80008000

Condition Modifier [Sharkbyte]
48000000 805B0D38
DE000000 80008180
1401AE78 0000000X
E0000000 80008000
X=values
0= never crashing
1= always crashing
2= always on side
3= always overheating
